meanings: [명사] reinforcement, (힘·권력 등의) consolidation, [동사] reinforce, strengthen, (힘·권력 등을) consolidate, (규칙 등을) tighten (up), (증강하다) build up

vlive.korean: 옵션 강화하세요! 옵션 강화! You need to upgrade your weapons! 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요

그래서 또 제가 바다로 알아봤죠 - 강화도에 무슨 바다요? So I looked for a beach that's close to here. - In Ganghwado Island? 듣기 View video N.Flying : 🏕제 2회 여름승협캠프 #1 미리보기
vlive.english: So I looked for a beach that's close to here. - In Ganghwado Island?

examples.korean: The bridge is reinforced with huge steel girders. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 다리는 거대한 철강보로 강화되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
